alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 16 at 12:55PM CDT until March 16 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL JACKSON...NORTHWESTERN TILLMAN AND NORTHWESTERN WILBARGER COUNTIES... At 1254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Elmer, moving east at 40 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR FREDERICK. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Frederick, Tipton, Manitou and Hess. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
